articles.description: Crypto majors bounce with stocks & gold after CPI. Kamala odds flip Trump after Presidential debate. SUI, FTM, ICP, TON lead gains in Alt L1s. Grayscale launches XRP trust, SUI to follow. FTX unstakes part of SOL position, large unlocks in Q1. 5 major announcements coming for SOL this month. SOL active addresses hits ATH for any blockchain. ETH dominance falls to 14%, lowest level in 3 years. AI coins strong as Nvidia & chip optimism returns. SWIFT set to build infrastructure for RWA trading. Coinbase launches wrapped Bitcoin product. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Pendle introduces Bitcoin yield pools at 45%. POPCAT gets Kraken listing, leads top SOL memes. SUNDOG breaks $300m after ByBit spot listing. Casino tokens rise, RLB up 100% in 2 weeks. Ape Punk sells in ‘heist’ for 10ETH. XCOPY editions & 1/1s see high sales. Fantasy Top trading volume continues to grow. Trump family set to launch crypto project Monday.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 199 - SO ABOUT YESTERDAY

articles.description: Magic Eden's grip on the NFT market has been cemented by a multi-chain approach under co-founder and CEO Jack Lu. Now the marketplace is pushing forward with a digital wallet that bridges Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana as it eyes other future expansions. Lu discusses Magic Eden's evolution since its early days, along with valuable lessons learned in the turbulent crypto industry.
articles.title: Why CEO Jack Lu Is Pushing Magic Eden Beyond NFTs

articles.description: Crypto rises with stocks after CPI falls again. Bitfinex BTC longs continue to grow. SUI again leads L1s, up 18%. FTX estate unstakes $24m SOL, still has $943m. Binance introduces SOL liquid staking. SWIFT introduces infrastructure for RWA transfers. Pendle launches Bitcoin yield pools. UK makes crypto legal property. India leads crypto adoption for second year. Vitalik won’t advertise L2s with multi-sig security. Based rollups seen as alternative future for ETH. Blockchain music start up raises $50m. Ford & Toyota file blockchain patents.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 198 - THE GREAT APE HEIST!

articles.description: Crypto falls slightly after Presidential debate. Exchanges see highest BTC outflow since May. Be wary of Yen move for BTC: Hayes. SOL active addresses hit ATH. At least 5 massive SOL announcements coming: Mert. Binomial to introduce restaking on BNB. Indonesian exchange hacked for $22m. Atomic Wallet wins lawsuit over $100m hack. Lawyers argue Ellison shouldn’t go to jail. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Galaxy & State Street launch 3 crypto ETFs. Standard Chartered begins UAE crypto custody. AAVE leads resurgence in DeFi coins.
articles.title: Fomo Hour 197 - Debate Disaster

articles.description: BTC ETFs: +$29m, ETH ETFs: -$5m. BTC rallies, ETF has first inflow in 9 trading days. BTC may have put in first higher low in 6 months. Saylor predicts $13m price for BTC. Wealth advisors quickly adopting BTC: BitWise CEO. Binance among few firms to get Indonesia license. Spot trading on CEXs up 30% in August. SEC made $4.68bn from crypto firms in 2023. $5.6bn lost to scams in 2023. XRP security status may be unchallenged in appeal. EtherFi announces credit card on Scroll. Base has more DEX users than other L2s combined. Tether & Tron create taskforce against crime. TIA still only making $585 in daily fees. WLD investigated by Singapore police.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 196 - THE INFLOWS RETURN!

articles.description: BTC: 55.3k (+2%), ETH: 2320 (+1%), SOL: 130 (0%). Top Gainers: FTM, TAO, BTT, AAVE, TON, ATOM. Crypto mini-bounce continues, BTC reclaims $55k. BTC RSI hits lowest level since July 2021. Bitfinex longs continue to grow aggressively. BTC hashrate hits another ATH. BTC could hit $90k on Trump election: Bernstein. BlackRock settles intraday BTC trades off-chain. Spot BTC ETFs have been a failure: Bianco. Power giant Tepco explores Bitcoin mining. ETH Foundation & Vitalik continue to sell ETH. Farcaster DAU’s down 95%.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 195 - CAN WE GET A BOUNCE?

articles.description: Media company DASTAN, the parent company of Decrypt and Rug Radio, is embarking on the next stage of its evolution with the launch of MYRIAD, a prediction market and engagement ecosystem that aims to “transform the digital media landscape.”
articles.title: Presenting MYRIAD, a prediction market and digital media engagement ecosystem

articles.description: Crypto weak after continued ETF outflows. Durov breaks silence, TON bounces 3%. Telegram will start moderating private chats. Hayes & Brandt flip bearish on BTC. Coinbase shares hit 7 month lows. 90% of crypto firm applications rejected in UK. Japan’s 3 largest banks to trial stablecoins. Trump promises again to embrace crypto. INJ launches BlackRock BUIDL index. DWF to launch synthetic stablecoin. Vitalik to donate all L2 tokens to charity. Most VCs in crypto ‘will disappear’.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 194 - ARE NFTS BACK?

articles.description: Head of Research at CoinMarketCap, Alice Liu, breaks down the highs and lows of meme coin mania in 2024. We’ve seen meme coins like Dogwifhat (WIF) soar to huge market caps and we’ve seen political meme coins crash as the candidate drops out (BODEN). Liu explains the data behind all of this.
articles.title: Crypto Researcher Explains Meme Coin Mania

articles.description: Crypto falls on macro wobble, Yen fears. OI wiped in BTC drop to $56k, funding negative. Altcoins down 13% YTD, stablecoin supply up 30%. BTC mining profitability at record low: JP Morgan. FBI says North Korea targeting BTC ETF issuers. Trump family to launch DeFi project on ETH. Trump project linked to AVAX’s Dough Finance. Trump family members hacked during launch. AI coins underperform after Nvidia investigation. MATIC upgrade to POL begins. TON falls as Telegram faces issues in many countries. VC funding & BTC correlation breaks down. We have entered crypto’s ‘corporate phase’. Gensler will leave regardless of election: Ripple CEO. Harris campaign has asked Coinbase for advice. Penpie DeFi project hacked for $27m. Galois Capital settles with SEC over FTX custody.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 193 - NVIDIA DROPS-OFF

articles.description: OI continues to rise as BTC stabilises. BTC still best performing assets class this year. FTX to distribute $16bn to creditors starting in Q4. Qatar introduces regulatory framework for crypto. ETH L1s fees down 90%, L2 activity ATH. Base hits 14m monthly users, many may be Sybil. ETH is in death spiral: Krueger. SOL to see significant unlocks in Q1. Japan considers dropping crypto tax to 20%. Rate cuts won’t help BTC: Hayes. BTC should double after rate cuts: Tapiero. Mr 100 linked back to Upbit wallet. WazirX hacker moves funds to Tornado. SUI to launch handheld gaming device. Sony & PYTH announce collaboration.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 192 - WTF IS ETHERVISTA

articles.description: Kabosu, the dog many know as Doge and the mascot of Dogecoin, sadly passed away earlier this year. Its owner later adopted another Shiba Inu called Neiro which caused a long blockchain civil war with multiple tokens battling it out for liquidity. Now a month later SlumDOGE, the man who became a millionaire off Dogecoin (but never sold), explains why Neiro is a moment for the dog coin community to unite.
articles.title: Dogecoin Millionaire Explains How Neiro United Meme Coins

articles.description: BTC ETFs: -$72m, ETH ETFs: -$2m. BTC weekly volatility returns to multi-year lows. BlackRock BTC ETF sees first outflow in months. ETH dominance hits 4-year low. Vitalik linked wallet sells $2m ETH. Bukele talks up BTC impact in Time interview. CBoE files for ETH & BTC ETF options. Elon & Tesla win DOGE manipulation lawsuit. Macron denies inviting Durov to France. Trump promises to make US the ‘crypto capital’. Trump advertises Liberty Financial DeFi project. DeFi mindshare continues to grow.

articles.description: BTC: 59.7k (0%), ETH: 2545 (0%), SOL: 146 (-1%). Top Gainers: HNT, IMX, ICP, ADA, KCS. BTC ETFs: -$105m, ETH ETFs: +$6m. Bitcoin in tight liquidation range, ETH outperforms. ETH ETF sees first in flow in 10 days. Funding rates all turn negative. Mr 100 buys 500 BTC in dip. France formally charges Durov, can’t leave country. TON jumps 6% after Durov release. TON faces another outage related to DOGS. AI coins fall after Nvidia earnings. Crypto payments about to soar: Armstrong. Binance denies freezing Palestinian accounts. CryptoCom & Standard Chartered partner.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 190 - OPENSEA VS SEC

articles.description: BTC ETFs: -$127m, ETH ETFs: -$3m. BTC hits $58k after ETF outflows, then bounces. BTC sees largest exchange outflow in a year. Divergence between BTC & stocks grows. TON stops producing blocks briefly, price bounces. TON outage linked to DOGS launch. Maker DAO rebrands as Sky. USDS upgrade from DAI will have freezing function. Robinhood readds SOL support. SEC charges 2 brothers with $60m crypto scam. Nasdaq pitches options on BTC ETFs. Full-time open source devs under 8k in crypto. Crypto owners more likely to be ‘psychopaths’.

articles.description: BlackRock ETF sees biggest inflow in 35 days. BTC ETFs have 12 straight days of inflows. ETH ETFs have 8 straight days of outflows. ETH/BTC ratio continues to hit new lows. Russia to start using crypto for trade this week. Stablecoin TVL hits ATH of $168bn. Durov faces several serious charges in France. Telegram also under investigation in India. TRX flips TON, enters top 10 crypto coins. Crypto is the currency of AI: Naval. 84k new crypto millionaires created this year. SEC lawsuit against Kraken to proceed to trial. Aave proposes integration with BlackRock BUIDL. Celsius has repaid $2.5bn in assets so far.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 188 - TON CONTINUES TO FALL

articles.description: AI tokens lead ahead of Nvidia earnings. Crypto funds saw $533m inflows last week. BTC ‘bull market’ back on in IFP index. BTC close to ‘parabolic zone’ soon. Many coins ‘flipping back to bullish’ indicators. Open Interest begins to creep back up again. Binance Labs to focus on AI investments. 51 L2s now built on OP stack alone. Some exchanges rejected for Hong Kong license. Vitalik questions DeFi yields in crypto. New malware steals crypto on MacOS. Avalanche Discord hacked after Polygon.

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency market is on the cusp of another major bull run, with analysts predicting Bitcoin (BTC) to hit $67,000 again. When BTC reaches this milestone, it’s expected to ignite price explosions across a number of popular altcoins, including Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), and the new rising star, Mpeppe (MPEPE). In this article, we’ll explore why these three coins are poised for significant gains and why investors should keep a close eye on them as Bitcoin prepares for another rally.
 
Dogecoin: Ready for Another Surge? 
Dogecoin (DOGE) has been a favorite among crypto enthusiasts since it burst into the spotlight in 2021, largely due to endorsements from high-profile figures like Elon Musk. Dogecoin (DOGE) started as a meme coin, but over the years, it has solidified its posit…
articles.title: SHIB, DOGE & MPEPE All 3 Coin Predicted To Have A Price Explosion When BTC Hit $67,000 Again

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As the cryptocurrency market continues to surprise with unprecedented volatility, Mpeppe (MPEPE) is emerging as the new meme coin sensation. Investors who have traditionally held onto Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB) are now turning their attention to Mpeppe, which has seen explosive growth in the past few weeks. But what is it about Mpeppe that has captured the interest of these seasoned investors, and could it really surpass the gains of Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu?
 
The Power of Dogecoin and Shiba Inu 
Both Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB) have established themselves as major players in the meme coin space. Dogecoin (DOGE), initially launched as a joke in 2013, rapidly rose to fame with its Shiba Inu (SHIB) mascot and received major boosts from figures like Elon Musk. By 2021…
articles.title: Mpeppe’s Explosive Gains Grabs The Attention of Shiba Inu and Dogecoin Investors

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Cryptocurrency has proven time and again to be a game-changer in the financial world. With countless success stories of investors making millions from early adoption of digital assets, many are on the lookout for the next big opportunity. While there are thousands of cryptocurrencies to choose from, three stand out as prime candidates for massive gains in 2024: Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), and Mpeppe (MPEPE). Let’s explore how these meme coins have the potential to make you a millionaire by the end of 2024.
 
1. Dogecoin (DOGE): The Meme Coin That Never Fades 
Dogecoin (DOGE), originally created as a joke in 2013, has since solidified its place as a significant player in the crypto market. Often referred to as the “people’s coin,” Dogecoin (DOGE) has garnered the attention of high-pr…
articles.title: 3 Cryptocurrencies That Will Make You a Millionaire By The End Of 2024 Dogecoin, Shiba Inu and Mpeppe

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Ethereum (ETH), once hailed as the undisputed king of the DeFi world, is now seeing some of its most loyal investors look elsewhere for alternative profit opportunities. While Ethereum has provided stable returns and continues to lead in decentralized finance, recent market conditions have forced investors to diversify. In this quest for higher returns, Ethereum (ETH) investors are turning to Mpeppe (MPEPE), a new gambling token with massive growth potential.
 
Why Are Ethereum (ETH) Investors Looking for Alternatives? 
Ethereum (ETH) remains a solid investment in the crypto space, boasting an extensive ecosystem of dApps, smart contracts, and NFTs. However, its recent price volatility and declining performance have left some investors questioning whether Ethereum (ETH) will offer the mass…
articles.title: Ethereum Investors Look For An Alternative Profit Maker New Gambling Token Mpeppe is The Chosen One

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency market has been experiencing considerable fluctuations, with Quant (QNT) emerging as a dominant force in the altcoin space. Over the past week, QNT saw a massive 25% price increase, driven by positive market sentiment surrounding Bitcoin’s upward momentum and new staking features introduced on the Quant (QNT) network. However, while Quant (QNT) has been making headlines, another emerging project, Mpeppe (MPEPE), has quietly been securing support from QNT whales, signaling a potential major run for this decentralized gambling coin.
 
Quant Leads the Altcoin Market 
As Bitcoin continues to hold its ground above $58,000, the altcoin market has responded positively. Quant (QNT), alongside other key players such as Fantom (FTM) and Mantra (OM), led the charge with substantial…
articles.title: Proven Dominance: Quant Provides A Massive 25% Uplift Whilst Mpeppe Secures QNT Whale Support

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: Former U.S. President Donald Trump has led the launch of World Liberty Financial, a new cryptocurrency venture, raising concerns about potential conflicts of interest. The project, featuring the WLFI token, allocates 20% to the founding team, including the Trump family, and 63% for public sale. Despite heavy promotion, its purpose remains unclear. A leaked draft […]
articles.title: Trump’s World Liberty Financial Crypto Venture Reveals WLFI Token Structure

articles.author: Graeme Moore
articles.description: Trump’s new DeFi project may fail, as many do, but its launch, coming in the midst of a presidential campaign, is further proof that crypto has entered the mainstream, says Graeme Moore, head of tokenization at the Polymesh Association.
articles.title: Donald Trump Is Now a DeFi Enthusiast. Here’s Why It Matters

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrencies, innovation drives market value. A standout player in this race is GoodEgg (GEGG), an AI-powered social dating meme coin. With its unique blend of playful meme culture and cutting-edge technology, GEGG is quickly attracting both retail and institutional investors. Following the recent announcement of its ‘Social Scoring System’ feature, GEGG has taken its project to new heights, capturing the attention of key Solana (SOL) whales who are now jumping onboard.
 
The Power of AI and Social Scoring in Crypto 
GoodEgg (GEGG) stands out in the crypto world for its Play-to-Date model, which allows users to earn tokens through engaging in social interactions on a dating platform. Now, with the introduction of its ‘Social Scoring System,’ GEGG is expanding…
articles.title: AI Play-to-Date Meme GoodEgg Takes Project To New Heights After Announcing ‘Social Scoring System’ Feature, Solana Whales Jump Onboard

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency world is no stranger to bold predictions and groundbreaking developments. However, when a well-known Californian millionaire and philanthropist recently dubbed GoodEgg (GEGG) as “the spark and human revolution that Solana (SOL) was missing,” it sent waves through the investment community. While Solana (SOL) has been a driving force in the world of decentralized applications (dApps) and blockchain technology, GoodEgg’s fresh approach is catching the eye of seasoned investors. With its innovative blend of AI, social interaction, and meme coin culture, GoodEgg (GEGG) could be the game-changer that reinvigorates the crypto space.

articles.title: Californian Millionaire & Philanthropist Calls GoodEgg (GEGG) ‘The Spark and human revolution that Solana was missing’

articles.description:
The cryptocurrency world has been buzzing with excitement as Solana (SOL) experiences a 7.76% price increase, capturing the attention of both retail and institutional investors. This surge in value comes at a time when the crypto market is navigating through volatility, offering Solana holders an opportunity to explore new investments. One such exciting prospect is GoodEgg (GEGG), a social dating meme coin that is poised to shake up the crypto space with its unique AI-powered platform.
 
Solana’s Recent Performance 
Solana has been a dominant force in the cryptocurrency market, particularly in the DeFi space. Known for its fast transaction speeds and low fees, Solana has become the go-to blockchain for decentralized applications and projects looking to scale efficiently. Over the past week…
articles.title: Solana Price Prediction and Trading Volume: SOL 7.76% Price Increase Enables Holders to Diversify With This New Social Dating meme

articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
Bhutan has emerged as one of the key players in the world of bitcoin mining recently. Its holdings have now been estimated to be around $780 million.
 
 
This has come after Arkham Intelligence identified Bhutan as the fourth-largest governmental holder of bitcoin in the world. Unlike many other countries that acquire Bitcoin due to seizures or purchases, the wealth in cryptocurrencies by Bhutan comes from its own mining activities. This is because the country has an abundance of hydropower resources that it can tap to run its mining facilities.
 
A Unique Mining Strategy
 
The Kingdom of Bhutan has been mining Bitcoins since at least 2017, but it was only until last year that it stepped up measures to boost its operations significantly. Druk Holding & Investments, Bhutan’s investment arm …
articles.title: Bhutan Vaults To Top 4 In Global Bitcoin Reserves With $750 Million Haul

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The rise of new cryptocurrency projects has been a defining feature of the 2024 market, but few have captured attention like GoodEgg (GEGG). With its innovative approach to blending meme culture, AI, and virtual dating, GoodEgg is rapidly becoming one of the most sought-after digital assets, rivalling the hype surrounding Solana (SOL) back in 2021. The unique combination of social interaction and financial rewards offered by GoodEgg has made it a standout, and investors are eagerly snapping up tokens during the ongoing presale.
 
Solana’s Meteoric Rise in 2021: A Tough Act to Follow 
Solana (SOL) was the talk of the crypto world in 2021, achieving unprecedented growth due to its lightning-fast transaction speeds and low fees. Its Breakpoint event, innovative developments like Solana 2.0, a…
articles.title: GoodEgg Virtual Dating Platform Becomes Most Craved After Crypto Since Solana In 2021

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
In the rapidly evolving world of cryptocurrencies, meme coins and innovative blockchain projects are constantly challenging established players. GoodEgg (GEGG), an AI-powered social dating meme coin, has recently captured the attention of the crypto community with its 191% price increase, currently sitting at $0.00015. As GoodEgg continues to gain traction, Helium (HNT), once a dominant force in the decentralized wireless network space, is facing declining confidence among its key holders.
 
The New Power of GoodEgg (GEGG)

articles.title: Bigger Than Helium? HNT Losses Confidence Of Main Holders As GoodEgg Skyrockets 191%, Currently Priced at $0.00015

articles.author: Scott Garliss
articles.description: With the first Fed rate cut looming, the markets are in selling mood. But history shows that the S&P tends to rally after monetary easing, which in turn should support risk assets like cryptocurrencies, says Scott Garliss.
articles.title: Don’t Believe the Hype, the First Rate Cut Isn’t a Market Disaster

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As Bitcoin (BTC) inches closer to a breakout, investors are scrambling to identify the next big opportunities in the crypto space. One of the most intriguing plays is the emergence of Mpeppe (MPEPE), a gambling-focused cryptocurrency that is attracting attention from Stacks (STX) bulls looking for significant returns. The combination of Bitcoin (BTC)’s bullish momentum and Mpeppe (MPEPE)’s innovative platform has created a perfect storm for those seeking a 150x gain. Here’s why Stacks investors are flocking to Mpeppe (MPEPE) and why both cryptocurrencies could benefit from the rising tide in the market.
 
Bitcoin (BTC)’s Gradual Ascent Sparks Renewed Interest in Altcoins 
After a volatile few months, Bitcoin (BTC) has shown signs of stabilizing around the $60,000 mark, leading to renewed o…
articles.title: Bitcoin (BTC) Creeps Up and Stacks Bulls Pump Into Gambling Coin Mpeppe For 150x Gains
